script.name: Menu.Anarkis.Pirate.Setup.SM
script.description: Menu: Pirate Guild - Plugin Setup - Set Menu

line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled RRF info and adjusted ADS to permanent feature
* Put values, like value switch values and other init here
* The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
* set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
* Toggle pirate guild use of jumpdrive
* Set relation of PLAYER to pirates
* Set relation of PLAYER to pirate guild
* Toggle, if pirate guild is at peace with teladi
* Set Pirate Guild strength (difficulty: 0=Very low, 1=Low, 2=Medium, 3= Strong, 4=Very strong, 5=Insane)
* Destroy all bounty hunter ships, if bounty hunters were turned off
* ADS for defending Pirate Guild bases
* Allow Pirate Guild capitals to use ADS tactics item
* Pirate Guild ability to attack stations item
* Relationship Pirate Guild to player item
* Relationship Pirate Guild to other factions (Teladi)
* add custom menu info line to array $Menu: text=$dummy

sval.val: Menu: Pirate Guild - Plugin Setup - Set Menu
LU Update (Solarahawk): disabled RRF info and adjusted ADS to permanent feature
Put values, like value switch values and other init here
The following commented block is for performance sensitive menus. Uncommenting calls the menu control write refresh only when UI control is manipulated.
set menu option: $Menu, maximum menu height=25 lines
Toggle pirate guild use of jumpdrive
Set relation of PLAYER to pirates
Set relation of PLAYER to pirate guild
Toggle, if pirate guild is at peace with teladi
Set Pirate Guild strength (difficulty: 0=Very low, 1=Low, 2=Medium, 3= Strong, 4=Very strong, 5=Insane)
Destroy all bounty hunter ships, if bounty hunters were turned off
ADS for defending Pirate Guild bases
Allow Pirate Guild capitals to use ADS tactics item
Pirate Guild ability to attack stations item
Relationship Pirate Guild to player item
Relationship Pirate Guild to other factions (Teladi)
add custom menu info line to array $Menu: text=$dummy
